breakthroughPP.board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • breakthroughPP.board.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Setting, Viewable

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements Setting, Viewable
    Board provides parameters for an initial gaming board.

    Georg-August University Goettingen APP breakthroughPP SoSe 2016 Gr CodeSalat

    Author:
    Fabiola Buschendorf, Haseeb Anar

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
      throws PresetException
        Default constructor
        Throws:
        PresetException - if Board(26,26) throws one
        See Also:
        Board(int, int)

      • Board

        public Board(int newletters,
     int newnumbers)
      throws PresetException
        Creates a board and its initial status and tokens.
        Parameters:
        newnumbers - number of rows
        newletters - number of columns
        Throws:
        PresetException - if the parameters are not in this range: numbers in (6,26), letters in (2,26)

      • Board

        public Board(Board newboard)
      throws PresetException
        Copy constructor for Board
        Throws:
        PresetException

      • getLetters

        public int getLetters()

      • getTurn

        public int getTurn()

      • getStatus

        public Status getStatus()

      • getColor

        public int getColor(int num,
           int let)
        Returns the color of the specified field. It will not be checked of num and let are on the board.
        Parameters:
        num - the number of the field starting in the coordinate origin
        let - the row of the field starting in the coordinate origin
        Returns:
        the color of the field defined by (let,num)

      • getFields

        public int[][] getFields()

      • getColor

        public int getColor(Position position)
        Returns the color of the specified position. It will not be checked if position is on the board.
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the queried field.
        Returns:
        the color value of the field.

      • setTurn

        public void setTurn(int turn)
             throws PresetException
        Sets, whose current turn it is.
        Parameters:
        turn - the player in turn described through its color defined in Setting
        Throws:
        PresetException - if turn is not RED or BLUE

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(Status newstatus)
               throws PresetException
        Sets a new status on this board.
        Parameters:
        newstatus - the Status to be set.
        Throws:
        PresetException - if new status doesn't contain a valid integer.

      • setColor

        public void setColor(int num,
            int let,
            int newcolor)
              throws PresetException
        Set the color of the specified field
        Parameters:
        num - field position in y direction [0 n_x-1]
        let - field position in x direction [0 n_y-1]
        newcolor - color set at (let,num).
        Throws:
        PresetException - if the color is not valid or the Position (let,num) is not on the board.

      • initializeFields

        public void initializeFields()
        Initialize fields array with the tokens colors depending on board width (letters) and board height (numbers).

      • move

        public Status move(Move move)
            throws PresetException
        Sets a Move object on the board, verifies its validity, updates whosTurn variable to set next player and returns the new status.
        Parameters:
        move - Move to be set and validated on the board
        Returns:
        Status after the move has been placed on the board Status
        Throws:
        PresetException - on PresetExceptions in Position or getValidMoves or getTurn

      • updateStatus

        public void updateStatus()
        Checks if one player reached opponent's side or if one player is dead/ has no tokens and then sets status.
        See Also:
        Status

      • updateTurn

        public void updateTurn()
        Update whose current turn is.

      • getValidMoves

        public java.util.HashSet<Move> getValidMoves(int color)
                                      throws PresetException
        Calculate all valid moves for a player with a certain color.
        Parameters:
        color - color of the player whose valid moves are to be calculated (see Setting)
        Returns:
        a set containing all valid moves for the color.
        Throws:
        PresetException - if a Position in this function throws one or if the color is not specified as the color of a Player in Setting

      • printField

        public void printField()
        Prints the board to the command line

      • viewer

        public Viewer viewer()
        Lets others have view access only to the board
        Specified by:
        viewer in interface Viewable
        Returns:
        BoardStorage storage
